helpText: й_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________й.

generic.title: й_Error updating categories__________________________й
generic.message: й_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________й.

maxDepthExceeded.title: й_Error updating categories__________________________й
maxDepthExceeded.message: й_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________й.

destinationHasSameName.title: й_Error updating categories__________________________й
destinationHasSameName.message: й_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________й.

noSchema.title: й_Schema not found_________________й
noSchema.message: й_Item schema not found for user_________________й.

maxCharacter.title: й_Error updating categories__________________________й
maxCharacter.message: й_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________й.

deleteInUseCategory.title: й_Delete category________________й
deleteInUseCategory.message: й_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________й.

custom.title: й_Custom categories__________________й
custom.message: й_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________й.

arcgis.title: й_ArcGIS categories__________________й
arcgis.message: й_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________й.

iso.title: й_ISO categories_______________й
iso.message: й_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________й.

inspire.title: й_INSPIRE categories___________________й
inspire.message: й_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________й.
